alert.note: Alert for Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 28 at 4:59PM EDT until July 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 557 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA FOREST VENANGO IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA ALLEGHENY FAYETTE GREENE WASHINGTON WESTMORELAND IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA ARMSTRONG BUTLER CLARION INDIANA JEFFERSON PA IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST WEST VIRGINIA PRESTON TUCKER IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA MARION MONONGALIA THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BROOKVILLE, BUTLER, CANONSBURG, CLARION, CONNELLSVILLE, DAVIS, FAIRMONT, FORD CITY, FRANKLIN, GREENSBURG, INDIANA, KINGWOOD, KITTANNING, LATROBE, MASONTOWN, MORGANTOWN, MURRYSVILLE, NEW KENSINGTON, OIL CITY, PARSONS, PITTSBURGH METRO AREA, PUNXSUTAWNEY, TERRA ALTA, THOMAS, TIONESTA, UNIONTOWN, WASHINGTON, AND WAYNESBURG.
